Dhammahadayavibhanga Sutta：In the Sutta-Sangaha，a portion of the Dhammahadayavibhanga of the Vibhangappakarana （Vibh.422f ） - dealing with birth in the Kāmāvacara worlds，the good deeds that lead to birth therein，and the span of life in each world - has been taken as a separate sutta （No.14） and called by this name.
